name: Elatha FR4
flavor_text: The sun shines on both joy and grief.

frame.name: High-Impact Frame
frame.description: Slow-firing and high-damage. This weapon is more accurate when stationary and aiming down sights.

perks.description:
Omolon ocular technology. Long zoom. Highlights enemy targets. 
  •  Increases range
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed
perks.name: Signal MS5

perks.description:
Omolon ocular technology. Long zoom. 
  •  Increases range
  •  Decreases handling speed
perks.name: Impulse MS3

perks.description:
Omolon ocular technology. Long zoom.
  •  Increases range
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed
perks.name: Transmission MS7

perks.description:
Omolon post sight. Short zoom. 
  •  Greatly increases handling speed
  •  Slightly increases range
perks.name: Candle PS

perks.description:
Omolon post sight. Short zoom. 
  •  Slightly increases range
  •  Increases handling speed
perks.name: Spark PS

perks.description:
Omolon Post sights. Short zoom.
  •  Increases range
  •  Slightly increases handling speed
perks.name: Jolt PS

perks.description:
Omolon red-dot. Medium zoom. Highlights enemy targets.
  •  Increases range
  •  Slightly increases handling speed
perks.name: Flash HS5

perks.description:
Omolon red-dot. Medium zoom.
  •  Greatly increases range
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed
perks.name: Torch HS3

perks.description:
Speeds up charge.
  •  Faster charge time
  •  Decreases impact damage
perks.name: Accelerated Coils

perks.description:
Strong battery life.
  •  Increases magazine size
perks.name: Enhanced Battery

perks.description:
Large heavy battery.
  •  Greatly increases magazine size
  •  Greatly decreases reload speed
perks.name: Ionized Battery

perks.description:
Slower-building charge for higher damage.
  •  Increases impact damage
  •  Slower charge time
perks.name: Liquid Coils

perks.description:
Constrains recoil for every bolt.
  •  Increases stability
perks.name: Particle Repeater

perks.description:
Distance optimizations.
  •  Increases range
perks.name: Projection Fuse

perks.description: Increased ammo reserves. Faster reload, stow, and ready when you're crouching.
perks.name: Field Prep

perks.description: Increases accuracy, stability, and precision hit targeting when firing from the hip.
perks.name: Hip-Fire Grip

perks.description: This weapon can be drawn unbelievably fast.
perks.name: Quickdraw

perks.description: Aiming this weapon for a short period reduces flinch.
perks.name: No Distractions

perks.description: Increased accuracy, stability, and handling when firing while crouched.
perks.name: Firmly Planted

perks.description: Melee final blows reload this weapon's magazine from reserves.
perks.name: Grave Robber

perks.description: Reloading after a kill grants increased damage.
perks.name: Kill Clip

perks.description: Kills with this weapon generate grenade energy. Activating your grenade ability reloads this weapon from reserves.
perks.name: Demolitionist

perks.description: This weapon gains bonus damage when three or more enemies are in close proximity.
perks.name: Surrounded

perks.description: Increased reload, stability, and handling when enemies are in close proximity.
perks.name: Threat Detector

perks.description: Grants reduced charge time and increased handling speed for a short time immediately after swapping to this weapon.
perks.name: Backup Plan

perks.description: Faster time to aim down sights.
perks.name: Snapshot Sights
